reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what my daughter wanted for Christmas. And this was a very competitive price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars On my second one. Battery defective. Won't charge
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying I've been a Quip fan boy since the beginning. I've bought them for my entire family of five and have tried the limited metal colors, mouth wash, dental floss. Not all of the solutions have been good or better than what you can buy or get free from your dentist. But none of them have ever been defective or poorly designed. This rechargeable version cost more and fails on delivering on the design. One lasted almost 31 days before failing to hold a charge, and the second one lasted even shorter. Only 2 recharge cycles and dead. Just dead. Light says charging, but the toothbrush is just a normal non vibrating brush. Statistically getting two bad ones is crazy to think about with the thousands they must be selling, but I'm sure I'm not alone. STAY AWAY FROM THE RECHARGEABLE version. There is something wrong with it and I've now wasted time and money. Go with the tried and true battery one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I already own the battery model but was looking for the rechargeable one for travel. I love it and will be purchasing an extra one just for home. It’s just like the battery powered model but more flexible. It charges quickly and holds the charge well. I’m extremely happy with it and recommend it for anyone who wants to get away from being bothered with batteries!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Stocking Stuffer
reviews.reviewText: This made a great stocking stuffer for my boyfriend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working completely less than 3 months after purchase. I reported it to Amazon as there is a 3 month warranty and they said to contact Quip through the messaging portal. I contacted Quip and they said they couldn’t help me even though it’s within warranty. Based on reading other reviews here, it looks like this company is a scam and they know this product won’t last but won’t even honor the warranty. Save yourself your money and buy a Sustainable Tomorrow electric toothbrush instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Just Fine, Good Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: So, there’s a few reviews on here stating that their rechargeable Quip toothbrush was not holding a charge or stopped working. Perhaps there were some duds in the factory or something, there’s no way to be sure. However, with my experience I have had zero problems with this toothbrush. As soon as I got it I plugged in the charger and let it charge for awhile until it was time to brush that night. Since then, I’ve only had to charge it one other time. I have previously used a quip toothbrush and while I liked it, I found that changing the battery every so often became a bit annoying and I also think over time it wore down the handle since you had to disassemble it every time you did so. This toothbrush eliminates that hassle and I love that, otherwise it’s just another regular Quip toothbrush.So why only four stars if no problems?Here’s the thing, if you go into this a get this toothbrush having previously used a Quip brush (and liked it), you’ll be fairly happy with the results. Like I said, recharging is always better than having to use disposable batteries. But there’s a few notes I’d like to point out.The charger itself is magnetic and has a light on it that illuminates to let you know when the brush is connected and charging. However, mine will go out after just a minute or two even though the unit is still charging. That can be a bit misleading. So maybe the magnetic contact isn’t the greatest?The biggest thing to realize is if you’re shopping for an “electric toothbrush” then look elsewhere. Quip IS NOT an electric toothbrush. I say that because this toothbrush does not move bristles or clean etc any more than a regular brush would. That’s something people that have never used Quip before should take note of. This toothbrush is essentially, a glorified timer that times your brushing with vibrations in the handle. That’s it. So, you’re really paying a more premium price for a toothbrush that vibrates for two minutes. It won’t clean your teeth any better or worse than a regular old toothbrush will, it’s more of a psychological thing to get you in the habit of brushing your teeth more regularly and with better brushing habits. Therefore, it’s only 4 stars, because it’s not for everyone and it’s a bit of a premium price to pay for toothbrush with a timer. That’s just my two cents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish it stood up on the counter
reviews.reviewText: You pretty much have to stick it to the wall/mirror. I did this with my old one and it ended up being problematic for me. So I decided to keep the toothbrush holder in the little plastic base piece from the tube so I can stand it on my counter, but then you can't charge the toothbrush in that standing position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size, versatile cover and simple charging.
reviews.reviewText: I like that I can mount the brush off of my counter to save space and make it easier to clean. It's also a really familiar brush shape and size, coming from using a manual toothbrush it feels like I'm getting a boost without spraying toothpaste everywhere like other electric brushes I've tried. I also travel quite a bit and love that I can just roll the mirror mount off and transform it into a travel cover!
